name: Race Time!
description:
► One touch racer!
► Race against the world and challenge your friends
► New tracks and tournaments every day
► Simple to play but challenging to master!
► Cool racers to collect. Gotta collect ‘em all!

See how high you can finish in the daily tournament!

Tap on any racer in the leaderboard to race them one on one.

Picking the most valuable lanes are important when playing. Adjust your speed to drift into a more beneficial lane. The top players have great patterns for low times. Race them and then try to replicate it. Also, don't just release on the curves. Tapping keeps speed up.
